resources.string: Christian Daily Historical Devotion (CDHD) is a daily glimpse of particular events or historical personalities in both the Philippines and world history; and appropriate Bible verses to provide practical challenge and applications.
The following simple but tweaked quotations serve as CDHD\'s historical principles:
• In history, we can see God\'s story;
• Ang hindi lumingon sa kasaysayan, hindi makakarating sa kadakilaan.

It is important to be aware of the salient features of history because these can bridge us to a higher plane of living - one that is productive for the present and triumphant in the future with the Creator and Supreme History Maker!
